name: MIK (itch)
description:
MIK is a prototype 3D action platformer inspired by Sonic, Mario, Jak & Daxter and Ratchet & Clank between others.

It features 14 levels + 1 tutorial level.

The objective is simple, reach the end of the level as fast as you can!

This game is perfect for speedrunning, try it out!

Recommendations:

Play with a controller if possible, the mouse and keyboard controls are a bit harder.

The game is quite hard at the start, I recommend spending a bit of time in the tutorial level fully mastering the mechanics before jumping into more complicated levels.

*******Bug Report*******

-Videos in the tutorial level won't play-

There is currently no fix for this issue unfortunaly but I will eventually fix it. I uploaded a second downloadable file with some videos showing the tutorial moves if you wanted to check them out.

**************************

Any sort of feedback would be appreciated so feel free to leave a comment with your thoughts on it, it would be really appreciated.

Enjoy!
